alert.note: Alert for Hockley; Lubbock; Lynn; Terry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lubbock, Lynn, Terry and southeastern Hockley Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, the public reported landspouts near Ropesville and also near Locketville. The boundary responsible for these landspouts extended from 3 miles southeast of Ransom Canyon to 9 miles southwest of Locketville, and was moving slowly south. Additional landspouts will be possible along and near this boundary. HAZARD...Landspouts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Lubbock, Brownfield, Slaton, Tahoka, Wolfforth, Ransom Canyon, O`donnell, Grassland, New Moore, Locketville, Slide, Woodrow, Meadow, Wilson, Buffalo Springs, Ropesville, New Home, and Wellman LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If a funnel cloud or landspout is spotted, move into a sturdy building and report your sighting to the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Texas.
